description: This file defines the 'SplitUtils' object, which provides utility functions for splitting a string into a linked list of tokens based on spaces. It includes methods to split strings, validate tokens, and add valid tokens to the list.

classes.name: SplitUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string splitting utilities

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits the source string into tokens separated by spaces and returns a LinkedList of tokens

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds the token to the list if it passes validation

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if a token is valid (non-empty)
